paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 variant Arg-176-Trp (R176W) including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing of this cousin revealed two LQTS-associated mutations.

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with Long QT Syndrome type 2 (LQT2).

variants.segregation_data: The KCNH2 mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: The patient's mother was negative for the KCNH2 mutation.
key_quotes: Genetic testing of this cousin revealed two LQTS-associated mutations.
Mutations in KCNH2 cause long QT syndrome type 2 (LQT2) and are the second most common cause of LQTS.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in KCNH2 was reported in the paper.
